org.apache.distributedlog.common.util

Interface PermitLimiter


  • public interface PermitLimiter
    A simple limiter interface which tracks acquire/release of permits, for example for tracking outstanding writes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PermitLimiter NULL_PERMIT_LIMITER 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean acquire()
      Acquire a permit.
      void close()
      Close the resources created by the limiter.
      void release(int permits)
      Release a permit.

    • Field Detail

      • NULL_PERMIT_LIMITER

        static final PermitLimiter NULL_PERMIT_LIMITER

    • Method Detail

      • acquire

        boolean acquire()
        Acquire a permit.
        Returns:
        true if successfully acquire a permit, otherwise false.

      • release

        void release(int permits)
        Release a permit.

      • close

        void close()
        Close the resources created by the limiter.
